args.natural_language_statement: Suppose a 2 x 2 real matrix M is represented by z mapsto xi z + zeta bar z. Show that det M = |xi|^2 - |zeta|^2.

args.content:
/--
  Lean translation skeleton for the statement:
  Suppose a 2x2 real matrix M is represented by z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄.
  Show that det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2.
-/
import Mathlib
open Complex

theorem det_of_two_by_two_matrix_representation
  (ξ ζ : ℂ)
  (M : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ)
  (h : True) :
  M.det = |ξ| ^ 2 - |ζ| ^ 2 := by
  sorry

/--
  Translate: Suppose a 2x2 real matrix M is represented by z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄.
  Show det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2.
-/
import Mathlib
open Complex

/-- Real 2x2 matrix corresponding to the map z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄ with ξ, ζ ∈ ℂ. -/
def M_of_complex (ξ ζ : ℂ) : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ :=
  ![![ξ.re + ζ.re, -ξ.im + ζ.im],
     ![ξ.im + ζ.im, ξ.re - ζ.re]]

/-- The determinant of the real 2x2 matrix representing z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄ is |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2. -/
 theorem det_of_two_by_two_complex_map (ξ ζ : ℂ) :
  Matrix.det (M_of_complex ξ ζ) = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2 := by
  sorry

/--
  Translation: Suppose a 2x2 real matrix M is represented by z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄.
  Show that det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2.
-/
import Mathlib
open Complex

/-- Placeholder statement: if M represents the map z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄, then det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2. -/
theorem det_of_two_by_two_complex_map
  (ξ ζ : ℂ) (M : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ)
  (h : ∃ z : ℂ, True) : M.det = |ξ| ^ 2 - |ζ| ^ 2 := by
  sorry

  ![![ξ.re + ζ.re, -ξ.im + ζ.im],
     ![ξ.im + ζ.im, ξ.re - ζ.re]]

/-- The determinant of the real 2x2 matrix representing z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄ is |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2. -/
theorem det_of_two_by_two_complex_map (ξ ζ : ℂ) :
  Matrix.det (M_of_complex ξ ζ) = |ξ| ^ 2 - |ζ| ^ 2 := by

/--
Suppose a 2x2 real matrix M is represented by z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄.
Show that det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2.
-/
import Mathlib
open Complex

/-- Real 2x2 matrix corresponding to the map z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄ with ξ, ζ ∈ ℂ. -/
def M_of_complex (ξ ζ : ℂ) : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ :=
  ![![ξ.re + ζ.re, -ξ.im + ζ.im],
     [ξ.im + ζ.im, ξ.re - ζ.re]]

/-- The determinant of the real 2x2 matrix representing z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄ is |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2. -/

/--
Suppose a 2x2 real matrix M is represented by z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄.
Show that det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2.
-/
import Mathlib
open Complex

/-- Real 2x2 matrix corresponding to the map z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄ with ξ, ζ ∈ ℂ. -/
def M_of_complex (ξ ζ : ℂ) : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ :=
  ![![ξ.re + ζ.re, ζ.im - ξ.im],
     ![ξ.im + ζ.im, ξ.re - ζ.re]]

/-- The determinant of the real 2x2 matrix representing z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄ is |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2. -/
theorem det_of_two_by_two_complex_map (ξ ζ : ℂ) :
  Matrix.det (M_of_complex ξ ζ) = |ξ| ^ 2 - |ζ| ^ 2 := by
  sorry

/--
Statement: 2x2 real matrix M from z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄; det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2.

open Complex

/-- Determinant of the real 2x2 matrix representing z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄ is |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2. -/
theorem det_of_two_by_two_complex_map (ξ ζ : ℂ) :

/--
Statement: 2x2 real matrix M is the real representation of z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄.
det M = |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2.
-/
import Mathlib
open Complex

def M_of_complex (ξ ζ : ℂ) : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) ℝ :=
  ![![ξ.re + ζ.re, -ξ.im + ζ.im],

/-- The determinant of the real 2x2 matrix representing z ↦ ξ z + ζ z̄ is |ξ|^2 - |ζ|^2. -/
theorem det_of_two_by_two_complex_map (ξ ζ : ℂ) :
  Matrix.det (M_of_complex ξ ζ) = |ξ| ^ 2 - |ζ| ^ 2 := by
  sorry
